text:
Anatoliy Vishnevskiy (1 April 1935 – 15 January 2021) was a Russian demographer and economist. He was born in Kharkiv, Kharkiv Oblast. He was a visiting professor at Lumière University Lyon 2, the University of Paris 8 Vincennes-Saint-Denis, and Sciences Po.
Vishnevskiy was editor-in-chief of the information bulletin "Population and Society" and of the online journal "Demoscope Weekly". He was also a writer and historian of the White émigré.
Vishnevskiy died in Moscow on 15 January 2021 at the age of 85.
